arts.ttl: PSG settles for 1-1 draw with Lorient as forward Désiré Doué leaves injured
arts.sum: Lens missed the chance to overtake PSG after losing 2-0 at rock-bottom Metz, which secured its first win of the season with two late goals from midfielder Gauthier Hein. Paris Saint-Germain dropped points with a 1-1 draw at lowly Lorient on Wednesday and picked up another injury as forward Désiré Doué went off in the second half.

arts.ttl: Lorient vs PSG – Vitinha is blunt: “We weren’t very fluid.”
arts.sum: Vitinha, the 25-year-old Paris Saint-Germain midfielder, spoke to Ligue1+ after the 1-1 draw against Lorient this Wednesday at the Stade du Moustoir, in the 10th round of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season. Vitinha: “We had difficulty finding the right solution to attack.” Was it very difficult to find a way through? Yes, we had difficulty […]

arts.ttl: Lorient vs PSG – Parisians’ ratings: Doué on the ground, Nuno Mendes scores again
arts.sum: On Wednesday, during Matchday 10 of Ligue 1 2025-2026, Paris Saint-Germain faced Lorient at the Stade du Moustoir. After a match where the Red and Blue dominated without really converting their chances, they drew 1-1. Here are our player ratings for the Parisians. Goalkeeper – Lucas Chevalier (5) – An uneventful match; he didn’t have […]

arts.ttl: Lorient vs PSG Highlights (1–1): Paris held to a draw and loses Doué to injury
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain dropped points on Wednesday night in a tense 1–1 draw against FC Lorient at the Stade du Moustoir, during matchday 10 of the 2025–26 Ligue 1 season. Despite dominating possession and creating more chances, PSG failed to secure the win and suffered a major setback with the injury of young midfielder Désiré Doué. […]

arts.ttl: Désiré Doué stretchered off through injury as PSG draw with Lorient
arts.sum: Désiré Doué (20) was forced off on a stretcher during PSG’s 1-1 draw against Lorient in Ligue 1 on Wednesday evening. In the 62nd minute, the playmaker went down off…

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Lorient 1-1 PSG: Les Parisiens held in Brittany by resolute Les Merlus
arts.sum: Ligue 1 McDonald’s, Matchday 10, 29/10/25 PSG were held in Brittany (1-1) after a resolute performance from Lorient. Nuno Mendes (49′) opened the scoring with a rebound before Igor Silva’s…

arts.ttl: Pantaloni praises Dembélé and the contribution of Luis Enrique
arts.sum: On the eve of Paris Saint-Germain’s trip to Lorient, Lorient head coach Olivier Pantaloni spoke at a press conference about the form of Ousmane Dembélé (28), the 2025 Ballon d’Or winner. Admirative, the French coach praised Dembélé’s blossoming under Luis Enrique while acknowledging the huge threat he represents. Pantaloni: “If Ousmane Dembélé is on the […]

arts.ttl: Lorient vs PSG – Luis Enrique discusses the return to the squad and this complicated match
arts.sum: Luis Enrique, head coach of Paris Saint-Germain (currently 1st in Ligue 1), spoke at a press conference this Tuesday ahead of his team’s trip to face Lorient (16th) at the Stade du Moustoir on Wednesday (kick-off at 7 p.m., CET) as part of Matchday 10 of the 2025–2026 Ligue 1 season. On the sidelines of […]

arts.ttl: Lorient vs PSG – Pantaloni is blunt: “We’re going there with confidence that we’ll succeed.”
arts.sum: This Wednesday at 7 p.m. (CET), Paris Saint-Germain (1st) will face Lorient (16th) at the Stade du Moustoir as part of Matchday 10 of the 2025–2026 Ligue 1 season. In a press conference, Lorient coach Olivier Pantaloni spoke about the upcoming match, discussing his expectations, hopes, and, understandably, a certain level of apprehension ahead of […]

arts.ttl: Top 5 reasons to watch Lorient vs PSG
arts.sum: Here is our saga. Five good reasons to watch a match (with a few adjustments here and there). We will revisit the appealing aspects before each match with a mix of seriousness and humor.
